tasks.name: Team Arrives at Hall
tasks.desc: Start coffee and prepare breakfast.

tasks.name: Adoration Service
tasks.desc: All team members and Deacon attend adoration in Chapel.

tasks.name: Ensure Breakfast is Setup
tasks.desc:
All team members have coffee/water/snacks.
Invitation/Help Leader has breakfast.

tasks.name: Guests Start Arriving
tasks.desc: Guests will arrive, hand luggage to greeters, check in, and head to dining room.
tasks.room: Dining Room, Main Room, Hall B Entrance

tasks.name: Team goes to Assigned Stations for Check-In
tasks.desc: All team members will go to assigned stations for the check-in process.
tasks.room: Dining Room, Main Room, Hall B Entrance

tasks.name: Greet Guests at Curb
tasks.desc:
Greet guests, escort them to check-in table, carry their luggage, bag luggage, stay with guests and mingle.
Take note of meds.
tasks.room: Dining Room, Main Room, Hall B Entrance

tasks.name: Check Guests In
tasks.desc: Verify name is correct, update roster if needed, hand out name badge.

tasks.name: Table Blessing
tasks.desc: Say Grace before Breakfast.

tasks.name: Breakfast
tasks.desc:
Guests are served by team and escorted to a dining table.
Table leaders get with table members and introduce.

tasks.name: Call No Shows and Waiting List
tasks.desc: Invitation/Help leader calls no shows and anyone on waiting list.

tasks.name: Final Table Name Card Check
tasks.desc:
Check table name cards and remove any no shows and add any last minute additions.
Provide updated table assignment list to table leaders

tasks.name: Go to Main Room
tasks.desc:
All guests go to main room for introductions.
Escort guests to table and team moves to stand next to leader table.

tasks.name: Introductions
tasks.desc:
(Name, Time at MIC, Role)
Retreat leader starts off introductions (Explain role)
Formation leader (Explain role)
Facilities leader (Explain role)
Everyone else

tasks.name: Opening Prayer
tasks.desc: Formation leader explains intercessory prayer and invites everyone to ask the Lord for one special favor during the weekend.

tasks.name: Explain Facility
tasks.desc:
Our Team is here to serve you
Repeating a name once it is given,
Maintain an inside voice and silence when near the Chapel
Wearing name tags
No watches, cell phones as we have now begun to be on God’s clock, guided by The Holy Spirit.
Encourage full participation (No one is forced to participate/share.)
Sit at same table all weekend,
Restroom – Location.  If they forgot toiletries items, we have a few available please let your Table Leader or any of us know.
Breaks – please pay attention to bell and return promptly. We will have regularly scheduled breaks.
If guests need anything, please feel free to ask any one of us.
Feel free to eat any of the snacks on the table (indicate the snack table)

tasks.name: Renewal Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc:
The Renewal witness is escorted to the chapel by formation leader.
Formation leader prays over witness and returns to give bible enthronement.

tasks.name: Bible Enthronement
tasks.desc:
Formation Leader explains the purpose of Bible Enthronement
1st of 2 - Bible Enthronement: CRHP 8 Theme Song is Played while procession takes place
All Stand for Theme song and bible procession.
Sacristan and 2 others: Carry Crucifix, Candle & Bible, process around the Main Room, place the items in front of the podium: in order carried. Song's 1st Chorus ends just as items placed.
Sacristan reads the verse: 2 Timothy 3:16-17 - After reading all are seated

tasks.name: Explain Witness
tasks.desc:
- Explain purpose of Confidentiality prayer (honor the gift of the witness by valuing their confidentiality)
- Prayer for the Witnesser by the Formation Leader/Team
- Explains affirmation afterwards, not required but all are welcome
- SONG IS PART OF THE WITNESS, so the Witnesser will indicate when he is ready for affirmations
- Remind guests to not eat or leave the room during the witness out of respect.
- Etiquette for listening to a Witness
    During the Witness time, the lights will be dimmed 
    You may move your chair so you can see comfortably
      - Please refrain from eating during the talk
      - Please refrain from leaving the room during the talk
- Explain binders-turn to each witness’ topic during talk.

tasks.name: Retrieve Renewal Witness
tasks.desc: Escort renewal witness back to the main room.

tasks.name: Renewal Witness
tasks.desc:
Lights dimmed as Formation Leader and Witness approach the podium - Re-orient room
RETREAT LEADER introduces Witness Topic - Renewal
Leads Confidentiality Prayer, Introduces Witnesser, Prays for Witnesser
RENEWAL WITNESS and Transformation Prayer
Song and Affirmation (Sub-Music)

tasks.name: Renewal Witness Give Thanks
tasks.desc: Renewal witness goes to chapel to give thanks

tasks.name: Renewal Table Discussion
tasks.desc:
Sharing of Witness. Retreat Leader invites all to participate in the sharing of theme.
Encourages them to share their own experiences of renewal. (Sharing within tables)

tasks.name: Renewal Table Assignments
tasks.desc:
Retreat Leader will explain procedure for preparing table presentations then assign tables as follows.
Table 1: poem
Table 2: poster
Table 3: skit
Table 4: scripture
Table 5: cheer
Table 6: song

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING - Witness
tasks.desc: Renewal Witness comes back to main room.

tasks.name: Renewal Table Presentations
tasks.desc: Retreat leader facilitates table presentations introducing each table.

tasks.name: Break
tasks.desc: Snacks, drinks, bathroom

tasks.name: New Life in Christ Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc: New Life in Christ Witness escorted to Chapel.

tasks.name: Table Names
tasks.desc:
Explain and suggest that they be Christian based, Spiritual, Scripture Inspired.
If you’re not creative let the Holy Spirit select and pray.
Table Leaders: encourage guests to Come up with a table name
Announce breaks – explain no food or drinks allowed while Witness is presenting 
There will be lunch, Please keep quiet in halls

tasks.name: Table Name Presentations
tasks.desc:
TABLE NAMES: Retreat Leader asks each table their name and have one person explain why the name was chosen. 
Reminder: no eating or leaving during the witness

tasks.name: Retrieve New Life in Christ Witness
tasks.desc: Escort New Life in Christ Witness back to main room.

tasks.name: New Life in Christ Witness
tasks.desc:
Lights dimmed as Formation Leader and Witness approach the podium
FORMATION LEADER introduces Witness Topic -  New Life in Christ
Leads Confidentiality Prayer, Introduces Witnesser, Prays for Witnesser
NEW LIFE IN CHRIST WITNESS and Transformation Prayer
Song and Affirmation

tasks.name: New Life in Christ Witness Give Thanks
tasks.desc: New Life in Christ Witness goes to Chapel to give thanks.

tasks.name: New Life in Christ Table Discussion
tasks.desc:
Sharing of Witness. Retreat Leader invites all to participate in the sharing of theme.
Encourages them to share their own experiences of renewal. (Sharing within tables)

tasks.name: New Life in Christ Table Assignments
tasks.desc:
Retreat Leader will give table assignments.
Table 1: song
Table 2: skit
Table 3: cheer
Table 4: poem
Table 5: scripture
Table 6: poster

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING - Witness
tasks.desc: Escort New Life in Christ Witness Back to Witness Room.

tasks.name: New Life in Christ Table Presentations
tasks.desc: Retreat leader facilitates table presentations introducing each table.

tasks.name: First CRHP Chapel Visit
tasks.desc:
First CRHP Chapel Visit: Non-CRHP Adoration slot 11-11:40 vs leave when music turned off
Turn off sound for Gregorian Chants as we enter the Chapel - EP
"FORMATION LEADER explains Monstrance and etiquette that apply while in any Adoration Chapel where Christ is present.  
 - Participants can go to the chapel at any time during the weekend except during a witness
 - Feel free to ask any one of us to pray or be with them in the chapel. "
FORMATION LEADER - silently leads group to Chapel. Not required to stay in table groups
"FORMATION LEADER - Explains what Shared Prayer is and invites all to participate and how.
If not comfortable praying out loud, may do so silently. If we do Rosary/etc need explanation
Retreat Leader Starts, Formation Leader ends."
Setup Lunch Service: Meal is setup in dining area Kitchen Coordinator
Turn ON low sound for Gregorian Chants as we leave the Chapel

tasks.name: Lunch
tasks.desc:
Spirituality Witness eats first, then goes to Chapel. (Don't wait for others or prayer.)
Formation Leader leads prayer before lunch
Always let participants go through line first (unless witness needs to eat)
CRSP/CRHP Team serves plates, and carries plates for guest to table to eat.
Facilitator and Kitchen guide Meal Team to proper place at proper time
Meal Team, after serving, lines up in mass area facing dining tables, they introduce themselves and sing their Team Song while guests finish eating.  After intro and song, Meal Team may serve themselves and join receiving team to eat.

tasks.name: Wrap up Lunch
tasks.desc: Transition from Dining to Main Room

tasks.name: Retrieve Spirituality Witness
tasks.desc: Spiritually Witness escorted to main room.

tasks.name: Spirituality Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc: Spirituality Witness escorted to Chapel

tasks.name: Spirituality Witness
tasks.desc:
Lights dimmed as Formation Leader and Witness approach the podium

Leads Confidentiality Prayer, Introduces Witnesser, Prays for Witnesser

Christian Community Witness escorted to Chapel

tasks.name: Spirituality Table Presentations
tasks.desc: Retreat leader facilitates table presentations introducing each table.

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING - Witness
tasks.desc: Christian Community Witness escorted to Witness Room.

tasks.name: Christian Awareness Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc: Christian Awareness Witness escorted to Chapel

tasks.name: One-on-One Sharing
tasks.desc:
One-on-One Sharing. Retreat Leader will explain procedure.
"Participants pair up with someone they do not know and leave Witness Room together. Share the answers to these questions (card in table leader packet): 
- Where am I right now spiritually? 
- What is my present relationship with Jesus?
- What is holding me back from surrendering to Jesus right now?"
One person shares for 10 minutes and the other listens without interrupting or commenting.
After 10 minutes, the procedure is reversed. Each person will have 10 minutes to share.

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING - Switch
tasks.desc: Switch sharing

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING - Witness
tasks.desc: Escort Christian Awareness Witness to Witness Room.

tasks.name: Christian Awareness Witness
tasks.desc:
Lights dimmed as Formation Leader and Witness approach the podium
FORMATION LEADER introduces Witness Topic - Christian Awareness
Leads Confidentiality Prayer, Introduces Witnesser, Prays for Witnesser
CHRISTIAN AWARENESS WITNESS and Transformation Prayer
Song and Affirmation

tasks.name: Christian Awareness Witness Give Thanks

tasks.name: Christian Awareness Table Discussion
tasks.desc:

tasks.desc:
Retreat Leader will give the table assignments.
Table 1: scripture
Table 2: cheer        
Table 3: poster
Table 4: skit           
Table 5: song
Table 6: poem

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING - Witness
tasks.desc: Escort Christian Awareness Witness back to Witness Room.

tasks.name: Christian Awareness Table Presentations

tasks.name: Dinner
tasks.desc:
Reconciliation Witness eats first, then goes to Chapel. (Don't wait for others or prayer.)
RETREAT LEADER: Leads Meal Prayer
Music: Play Theme Song as we process to Dinner
Facilitator and Kitchen instruct Meal Team of serving and intro process and times
Always let participants go through line first (unless witness needs to eat)
CRSP/CRHP Team serves plates, and carries plates for guest to table to eat.
Meal Team, after serving, lines up in mass area facing dining tables, they introduce themselves and sing their Team Song while guests finish eating.  After intro and song, Meal Team may serve themselves and join receiving team to eat.

tasks.name: Wrap up Dinner
tasks.desc: Transition from Dining to Main Room

tasks.name: Reconciliation Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc: Reconciliation Witness eats first, then goes to Chapel. (Don't wait for others or prayer.)

tasks.name: Retrieve Reconciliation Witness
tasks.desc: Escort Reconciliation Witness to Witness Room.

tasks.name: Reconciliation Witness
tasks.desc:
Lights dimmed as Formation Leader and Witness approach the podium
Formation LEADER introduces Witness Topic - Reconciliation
Leads Confidentiality Prayer, Introduces Witnesser, Prays for Witnesser
RECONCILIATION WITNESS and Transformation Prayer
Song and Affirmation. No table sharing/presentations.

tasks.name: Sacristan Greets Priests
tasks.desc: Sacristan (CA) greets priests, prepares them for Reconciliation Service

tasks.name: Reconciliation Witness Give Thanks
tasks.desc: After Affirmation Witness escorted to Chapel to give thanks

tasks.name: Priest Talk on Reconciliation
tasks.desc:
Examination of Conscience pamphlets passed out to all guests (in table leader packet)
Talk on Reconciliation by Priest

tasks.name: Reconciliation Service Explained
tasks.desc:
Sacristan greets priests and escorts them to the Main Room for Introductions
Sacristan explains Reconciliation process and locations.
Sacristan leads the guests and Priests to the Chapel to pray prior to Reconciliation
Kitchen Coordinator to close Kitchen Closet Door during Reconciliation.

tasks.name: Reconciliation Service
tasks.desc:
SACRISTAN and others: Comfort guests going to reconciliation 2 Priests in Hall A area
Retreat Leader: stationed inside Chapel, gives lit candle to guest as they return from reconciliation
Guests gather in Chapel for penance and private prayer until all are done. 
Team:  in Chapel Praying, or comforting guests with reconciliation process
Sacristan & Facilitator escort all guests and team back to Witness Room
Kitchen: Removes all snacks, except water, from Main Room

tasks.name: Remove Snacks
tasks.desc: Kitchen: Removes all snacks, except water, from Main Room

tasks.name: Eucharist Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc: Eucharist Witness escorted to Chapel

tasks.name: Mass Setup - Quietly
tasks.desc:
SETUP for Mass. (QUIETLY)
Quietly setup for mass after all guests are in Main Room.

tasks.name: Retrieve Eucharist Witness
tasks.desc: Escort Eucharist Witness to Main Room

tasks.name: Eucharist Witness
tasks.desc:
Lights dimmed as Formation Leader and Witness approach the podium
FORMATION LEADER introduces Witness Topic -  Eucharist
Leads Confidentiality Prayer, Introduces Witnesser, Prays for Witnesser
EUCHARIST WITNESS and Transformation Prayer
Song and Affirmation. No Table sharing/presentations.

tasks.name: Eucharist Witness Give Thanks
tasks.desc: After affirmation, escort Witness to Chapel to give thanks

tasks.name: Ensure Late Night Snacks are set
tasks.desc: Check with Kitchen Coordinator to make sure Kitchen is set for late night snack.

tasks.name: Break
tasks.desc: BREAK - Bathroom NO Snacks

tasks.name: Buffer - Potential Break
tasks.desc: Buffer time. If used, can be a short break.

tasks.name: Former Teams Create Procession Line
tasks.desc:
Former CRSP/CRHP Teams with their Shirts and Candles Form a procession line to Mass
Greeters for Former Teams: MIC CRHP/CRSP invited
- weather permitting, outside former teams line up either side of sidewalk between Hall B and A
-Alternate: indoors, former teams 2 lines from Hall B door to last row of Mass seating space

tasks.name: Retrieve Eucharist Witness
tasks.desc: Escort Eucharist Witness to Main Room for Candle Light Walk

tasks.name: Candle Light Procession
tasks.desc:
Formation Leader:  Explains process for a "Candle Light Walk"
Table Leaders: Have their table guests light their candles and guide them to line up for procession, Table Leaders walk behind all guests
Guests form a procession line in Main Room, Table Leaders lead guests single file through candle line to Mass. (Single line if 25 or less / Double line if > 25)
Theme Song is Played and sung by all, until all are seated in Mass.
Facilitator: at entrance of Hall A to guide group to mass

tasks.name: Mass
tasks.desc: Formation Leader and Sacristan: Explain the tradition of all other CRHP Teams that are present.

tasks.name: Mass Cleanup
tasks.desc:
Escorts the participants and Giving team to main room
Former teams escorted out HALL A door.  Non-Table Leaders clean up mass setting and setup Dining Room tables for breakfast.  (Quietly)

tasks.name: Explain Overnight Process
tasks.desc:
Retreat Leader explains process Over night and wake up process.
Draw tables out of hat for order.
-Adoration as a team by table (Table Leaders have a nighttime alarm to wake up for adoration)
-Sleeping arrangements (Giving Team brings own bedding)
-How wake up works first thing
-If questions during the night, who to contact and how.

tasks.name: Late Night Social
tasks.desc: Late night Social with Snacks - Stay in Main room (till mass is cleaned up)

tasks.name: 1st Hour Table Adoration
tasks.desc: 1st table drawn goes to adoration for 1 hour.

tasks.name: 2nd Hour Table Adoration
tasks.desc: 2nd table drawn goes to adoration for 1 hour.

tasks.name: 3rd Hour Table Adoration
tasks.desc: 3rd table drawn goes to adoration for 1 hour.

tasks.name: 4th Hour Table Adoration
tasks.desc: 4th table drawn goes to adoration for 1 hour.

tasks.name: 5th Hour Table Adoration
tasks.desc: 5th table drawn goes to adoration for 1 hour.

tasks.name: 6th Hour Table Adoration
tasks.desc: 6th table drawn goes to adoration for 1 hour.

tasks.name: Team Wake Up Call
tasks.desc:
Pack up sleeping area.
Remind giving team to keep quiet.
You are on the HELP Team today.
Kitchen Start the Coffee.

tasks.name: Team Adoration
tasks.desc: Team attends adoration.

tasks.name: Wake Up Call
tasks.desc:
Music and Team: Wake up participants with song and they get dressed
Set up for breakfast/ all team put up participants sleeping area
Repack all guest belongings, strip beds, stack air mattresses against Hall B wall.
Check with Kitchen Coordinator to make sure kitchen is set for breakfast.

tasks.name: Morning Prayer
tasks.desc:
Everyone - Morning prayer – Everyone goes to the chapel for morning prayer
Formation Leader leads a prayer in the Chapel. All will then go to Dining Room.

tasks.name: Breakfast
tasks.desc: Team serves all participants, then serve ourselves and eat.  Best if mix up tables to meet others

tasks.name: Scripture Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc: Scripture Witness escorted to Chapel.

tasks.name: Wrap Up Breakfast
tasks.desc: Moves all from dining to main room

tasks.name: Bible Enthronement
tasks.desc:
FINAL- Bible Enthronement: Team Song is Played while procession takes place
All Stand for Theme song and bible procession.
Sacristan and 2 others: Carry Crucifix, Candle & Bible, process around the Main Room, 
place the items in front of the podium: in order carried. Song should end just as or after placed.
Sacristan reads the verse: 2 Timothy 3:16-17 - After reading all are seated

tasks.desc: Scripture Witness escorted to Chapel.

tasks.desc:

tasks.name: Father's Loving Care Witness to Chapel
tasks.desc: Fathers Loving Care Witness escorted to Chapel

tasks.name: Break
tasks.desc: Snacks, drinks, bathroom.

tasks.name: Retrieve Father's Loving Care Witness/HELP Preperations
tasks.desc:
Father’s Loving Care Witness escorted to Witness Room.
All table leaders and team move from Main room to Conference Room to pray during witness
RETREAT LEADER will lead team in prayer during witness in HELP Room
Formation Leader and Music stay in Main room during witness and presentation of HELP

tasks.name: Father's Loving Care Witness
tasks.desc:

FORMATION LEADER introduces Witness Topic -  The Father's Loving Care
Leads Confidentiality Prayer, Introduces Witnesser, Prays for Witnesser
FATHERS LOVING CARE WITNESS and Transformation Prayer
Song and Affirmation  -- Guests affirm the Witness

tasks.name: Father's Loving Care Witness Give Thanks

tasks.name: HELP Letters
tasks.desc:
FORMATION LEADER explains HELP Letters possibly mini reflect on witness 
All table leaders locate their table HELP bags and prepare to deliver HELP bags w/a helper
PRESENTATION of HELP After Formation Leader explanation / reflection
Table leaders – present HELP bags to attendees at their table. (TL may have 1 helper if needed)
Attendees might read letters in main room, chapel or dining room.
If team members wish to pack their personal belongings they might do so at this time 
Restroom break as well.
tasks.room: Dining Room, Main Room, Chapel, Help Room

tasks.name: 5 MINUTE WARNING
tasks.desc: 5 min. warning to return to Main Room

tasks.name: HELP Conclusion
tasks.desc:
All attendees are gathered in Main Room for HELP Conclusion.
FORMATION LEADER - Concludes letter reading with a prayer.
Table leaders lead thanks for God’s HELP, then attendees share.

tasks.name: Chapel Visit
tasks.desc:
Retreat Leader == Chapel Visit 3 - TBD
Table leaders lead tables to Chapel for prayer and thanksgiving

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING
tasks.desc: Make sure Dining Room is ready for lunch

tasks.name: Lunch
tasks.desc: MUSIC: Play Theme song as group processes to Lunch

tasks.desc:
Discipleship Witness First in line to eat

tasks.name: Wrap Up Lunch

tasks.desc: Discipleship Witness escorted back to Witness Room.

tasks.desc:

FORMATION LEADER introduces Witness Topic -  Discipleship

tasks.name: Table Discussion
tasks.desc:
Formation Leader reflects on call to Evening of Discipleship, and then asks participants to share their response to the call of discipleship. 
-Requests Table Leaders to share their experience of team formation and ministry at their tables.
-Provide time for participants to write their own Personal Commitment Prayer on inside of handout.

tasks.name: 2 MINUTE WARNING
tasks.desc: Conclude table discussions

tasks.name: Dinner/Discipleship Service Prep
tasks.desc:
Make sure Dining Room is set for Last Supper.
Make sure Monstrance has been reposed and everything is set for Last Supper.
Preparation for Discipleship Service.

tasks.name: Bathroom Break
tasks.desc: Quick break for bathroom.

tasks.name: Discipleship Service Preperation
tasks.desc: Formation Leader reflects on Last Supper and prepares participants for Discipleship Service

tasks.name: Discipleship Service
tasks.desc: Service recalling Last Supper and Foot Washing

tasks.name: Closing Remarks
tasks.desc:
Retreat Leader will talk about Evening of discipleship and give closing remarks.
Dismissal process: gather all belongings, Exit via Hall B door, assistance is available

tasks.name: Closing Prayer
tasks.desc:
Formation Leader will read the closing scripture and prayer.
Meal Team, after serving, lines up in mass area facing dining tables, they introduce themselves and sing their Team Song while guests finish eating.  After intro and song, Meal Team may serve themselves and join receiving team to eat.

tasks.name: Dismissal
tasks.desc: Dismissal - Team members should help participants gather all their belongings.
